column1: All the animals burst out laughing as they looked at Bonney. Bonney stopped and looked at them and asked
column2: "What is so funny?" "Are my back doors opened? Are my front tires flat? Is my rearview mirror out of place?" Rabbit came up to Bonney and said
column3: "Why are you pretending you are a car? Bonney said
column4: "I'm not pretending. I am a car. I have four doors. Beep! Beep! Beep…Vroom!" Mrs. Goose pointed to Bonney's reflection in the lake and said
column6: you are a h-o-r-s-e." Bonney looked at her image and opened her mouth to look at her teeth and shook her head saying
column7: "I don't see a horse." Then she opened her mouth and said
column10: so it won't overheat." Mrs. Duck laughed and tried to convince her saying
column13: Look!!" Bonney looked at her hooves and shook her head saying
column15: and I drink gas to move."
